resources.string: Based on your age, PG-13 movies may contain some scenes that are not suitable for you.ℹ️ \n Additionally, you must watch R-rated movies with a parent ❗ \n and avoid watching NC-17 movies.⛔
Based on your age, you must watch R-rated movies with a parent ❗ \n and avoid watching NC-17 movies.⛔
Your movie rating category is G, which means you can watch all types of movies.
